You Are The Superhero We Need

Save the world

We are all a part of the world, we all have an impact. To save the world, we all need to act.

Here, we will show you how, and why. In the meantime, here are some great resources.

  • A great carbon calculator from the French government, available in English and French.
  • Ten simple choices for a healthier planet, from the National Ocean Service of the USA.
  • WWF’s ten things you can do.
  • An illustrated guide on what you can do to help by the UK’s Natural History Museum.

Want to contribute? This website is open source and available on Github.
